alert.note: Alert for Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ISLE ROYALE NATIONAL PARK THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Windigo to 33 miles south of Grand Portage. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Siskiwit Lake, Mott Island Park Headquarters, Rock Harbor, Windigo, and Mount Desor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
